job_description:
• Track market trends, customer needs, and competitive positioning to inform messaging, differentiation, and strategy.
• Currently enrolled in an Engineering program, into PEY periodExperience with Python (NumPy, Pandas, PyTorch/TensorFlow)Familiarity with C/C++ and at GPU programming frameworks (ROCm, CUDA or OpenCL)Experience with version control (Git), and basic Linux system administration.
• Location: Austin, TX, USOnsite/Hybrid: This role requires the student to work full time (40 hours a week), onsite work structure throughout the duration of the co-op/intern term.
